title: Move in Special, Receive $250 Off At Move In
posting_body: Welcome home to The Crossings at Bear Creek
Discover a place where natural beauty and contemporary convenience coexist.
With 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom floor plans, Crossings at Bear Creek Apartments in Lakewood, CO, offers comfortable amenities plus breathtaking views of the Rockies.
Your new home welcomes you with a fireplace, oversize tub, and private balcony or patio.
The apartment community comes to life with a beautiful creek and wildlife views.
Plus, with major highways less than one mile away, and shopping and restaurants nearby, you'll find it easy to get where you're going and a joy to return.
We think it can be measured in the spacious floor plans of our apartments in Lakewood.
Extra comforts like our full size washer and dryers throughout each apartment home make living here easy.
Crossings at Bear Creek is convenient, not just in location, but in providing the kinds of comforts and amenities that make life better in so many ways to simplify your life and welcome you home.
You'll feel good on the outside, too.

Crossings at Bear Creek apartments in the Denver area offer amazing views of the Rocky Mountains, close access to some of the best ski resorts and minutes away from a biking trail down the Bear Creek National Park which rests along the back side of the community.
On those hot summer days, enjoy the relaxing pool nestled along the rustling Bear Creek or enjoy a day at the spa.
If your desire is to work out in a well-equipped fitness facility, Crossings at Bear Creek offers a 24-hour on-site gym.
Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1075 Sq.
- Solid Surface Quartz or Granite Counter-tops
- Views of Rocky Mountains or Bear Creek
- Designer Flooring including Wood Plank and Berber Carpet
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
